Description: Schedule initial Status Meeting with Relevant personnel
Content: Organize an immediate meeting with all key stakeholders, including upper management and relevant department heads, to discuss the current situation, share initial findings, and outline next steps.
Contact supplier to retrieve information about ongoing efforts related to the incident. When will patch be available? What are the IOCs? What actions can be taken to mitigate the risk
Decide whether to disconnect affected vendor services until patch is available. Consider business impact and risk of compromise.
When patch is available, patch affected services

Description: Inform employees that there is a low threshold for reporting suspicious activity

Content: Use IOCs to determine whether organization is compromised
Identify systems and infrastructure potentially affected by the supply chain attack and assess the potential consequences.
